page.title: 13Bower School 1985
page.content: The kind of work we do through the week at school is : 360 English, SPMG Maths, computer program work, PE and minor games, science, technology, geography, reading, spelling and project work. In Bower School there are 34 pupils altogether in 2 classes: P4-7 Mr Bramley, P1-3 Miss Moodie. The classes are as follows: Primary 7 Primary 6 Guy Roberts Dale Johnston Marcus Farquhar Jean Sandison Barbara Sutherland Deirdre Alexander Primary 5 Ian Henderson Iain Sutherland Janet Hossack Anthony Wicks Linda Sinclair Simon Bowser Morag Henderson
